questions.question: Which of the following is correct?

answers.a: Young's modulus (Y) is defined as the ratio of linear stress to linear strain
answers.b: Rigidity modulus (n) is defined as the ratio of shear stress to shear strain
answers.c: Bulk modulus (K) is defined as the ratio of volume stress to volume strain
